articles.title: Married coach says ‘he ‘killed wrestler Nisha Dahiya for affair after their break-up’ - ThePrint
articles.description: Pawan Barak, wrestler Nisha Dahiya’s coach, is learnt to have said during his preliminary interrogation that he was 'infuriated' about her affair with someone else.
articles.content:
New Delhi: The prime suspect in the murder of wrestler Nisha Dahiya and her brother Sooraj her coach Pawan Barak has told Delhi Police that it was a crime of passion, ThePrint has learnt.

articles.title: Ravi Shastri opens up on equation with BCCI president Sourav Ganguly: There is enough mutual respect - India Today
articles.description: Former India coach Ravi Shastri said that BCCI president Sourav Ganguly is his "buddy" and both share an equal amount of mutual respect for each other.
